name: Where Does the Gold Dust Lead?
name_original: Where Does the Gold Dust Lead?
description:
To-do list:

1. Move

2. Start working

3. Get work experience and transfer to a big company!

4.

5. How do I know this person?

Do you want to solve this enigma? Or maybe you are more attracted to your dorm mates? Try not to lose yourself by diving deeper and deeper into this mysterious world.

Thomas & Friends is owned by Mattel.

This fan game is made according to my au, so there may be discrepancies with the original story.

English is not my first language, so if you find any mistakes in the translation, please let me know.

The full version of the game may (or may not, I will edit the warning list with each new big update) have various themes of violence, bad and rude jokes, death and suicide, accidents, various illnesses, but they will be present in the form of hints in the game.

In this version, there is only a fight scene without blood.

It is implied that the protagonist is female, but this is clearly visible only in the Russian version due to the peculiarities of the language. This is done to avoid problems with the law of my country. Otherwise, I will have to put an age rating of 18+. In the English version, due to the peculiarities of the language, nothing should indicate the sex/gender of the protagonist.
